title: Decentralized Finance (DeFi). (arXiv:2304.01918v1 [q-fin.GN])
abstract: Decentralized finance, powered by blockchain technology, is growing day by day. This field, which emerged a few years ago, today manages $70 billion in assets. In this study, the concept of decentralized finance is discussed and explained the differences from traditional finance. Then, compliance with the legal regulations and the requirements to ensure compliance are mentioned. An evaluation has been made about the financial services offered by the decentralized finance field and the stock market and stablecoins that it uses as a tool while providing these services. Its economic effects, security and, privacy dimensions are examined. In the study, the differences between centralized and decentralized finance, which generally covers legal, economic, security, privacy, and market manipulation, are systematically analyzed. A structured methodology is presented to distinguish between centralized and decentralized financial services. Keywords: decentralized finance, FinTech, financial regu

translated_abstract: 去中心化金融，由区块链技术驱动，正在不断增长。这个领域几年前才出现，今天管理着价值700亿美元的资产。本研究讨论了去中心化金融的概念，并解释了它与传统金融的区别。然后提到了合规性法规和确保合规的要求。对去中心化金融领域提供的金融服务以及它用作工具的股票市场和稳定币进行了评估。研究了它的经济效应、安全和隐私维度。系统分析了中心化和去中心化金融之间的差异，其中涵盖了法律、经济、安全、隐私和市场操纵等方面。提出了一种结构化的方法来区分中心化和去中心化的金融服务。
tldr: 本研究讨论了去中心化金融的概念、法规合规性以及其提供的金融服务和使用的工具，评估了它的经济效应、安全和隐私维度，并系统分析了中心化和去中心化金融之间的差异，提出了一种区分两者的方法。
en_tdlr: This study discusses the concept and regulatory compliance of decentralized finance, evaluates its economic effects, security and privacy dimensions, analyzes the differences between centralized and decentralized finance, and presents a structured methodology to distinguish between the two.
